conversations.question: Can you tell me what is Circuit breaker? What is Underhad problem Circuit breaker?
conversations.answer: Yeah, so Circuit Breaker basically manages the state of the system. The thing is state of circuit breaker changes from close to open when failure rate is above a certain threshold which you can configure in your system.
